title: "Afghanistan" title and captions typeface
content: I'm working on the layout of a small photo essay from Afghanistan and I'm trying to find an appropriate typeface for the titling and caption of the photos. I don't want to fall into clichés, but at the same time want to find something sympathetic to the material... any ideas?
author: loki

comments.content:
It is a photo essay on the topic of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_.

Cheers!
